meanings.definition: A very large but unspecified number
meanings.sent1: I have lost track of the umpteen times I have reminded you to clean your room.
meanings.sent2: There are umpteen books on the shelf waiting to be read.
meanings.sent3: After umpteen tries, I finally mastered the art of baking cookies.
meanings.sent4: The umpteen stars in the sky twinkled brightly on a clear night.
meanings.sent5: The umpteen balloons at the party created a colorful spectacle.

meanings.sent1: She has umpteen reasons why she loves ice cream.
meanings.sent2: There are umpteen possibilities for our weekend getaway.
meanings.sent3: The umpteen cupcakes at the bake sale disappeared in no time.
meanings.sent4: The umpteen leaves on the ground rustled in the autumn breeze.
meanings.sent5: The umpteen waves crashing against the shore sounded like a symphony.
